TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CookieContainer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 物件集合的容器 (Container)。

span.span: Provides a container for a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是提供的儲存體的資料結構的執行個體類別和其存取資料庫類似的方式。A is a data structure that provides storage for instances of the class, and which is accessed in a database-like manner. 容器建立或變更屬性時設定的容量限制。The has a capacity limit that is set when the container is created or changed by a property. 執行個體類別隨即加入至其原始 URI 所根據的容器。An instance of the class is added to the container based on its originating URI. 它會加入至內部URI 相關聯。It is added to an internal associated with the URI. A擷取自 URI 作為容器，或可用來送出 HTTP WebRequests 的字串。A is retrieved from the container based on the URI as a , or as a string that can be used to submit HTTP WebRequests. 有三個屬性，以管理容器的內容的磁碟區： ， ，和。The has three properties that govern the volume of the content of the container: , , and . 這些值有預設值是 300、 4096 和 20 分別。These values have the default settings of 300, 4096, and 20 respectively. 當會新增至容器，這些屬性可用來判斷是否中已經包含應該捨棄挪出空間給新。When a is added to the container, these properties are used to determine whether a already contained in the should be discarded to make room for the new one. 會追蹤以確保每次新增兩和超過限制。The keeps track of each addition to ensure that neither the nor the limits are exceeded. 如果一個或兩個超過，然後執行個體所持有會移除。If one or both are exceeded, then instances held by the are removed. 首先，任何過期已移除。First, any expired is removed. 如果必須捕捉進一步的容量，然後最小最近使用都會被清除。If further capacity must be recaptured, then the least-recently used is purged.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性等於或超過屬性，一或多個加入之前從容器移除執行個體`cookie`參數。If the property equals or exceeds the property, one or more instances are removed from the container before adding the `cookie` parameter. 夠執行個體將不會移除下方，如下所示： 如果在給定範圍中有過期的執行個體，它們會被清除。Enough instances are removed to bring below as follows: if there are expired instances in the given scope, they are cleaned up. 如果沒有，然後最近最少使用已找到並移除從容器。If not, then the least recently used is found and removed from the container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性等於屬性，一或多個之前加入的內容從容器移除執行個體`cookies`參數。If the property equals the property, one or more instances are removed from the container before adding the contents of the `cookies` parameter. 夠並移除執行個體，以騰出供`cookies`，如下所示： 如果有過期的執行個體，它們會被清除。Enough instances are removed to make room for `cookies` as follows: if there are expired instances, they are cleaned up. 如果沒有，或需要更多空間，然後最近最少使用已找到並移除從容器。If not, or if more room is needed, then the least recently used is found and removed from the container.

summary.span: 將 加入至特定 URI 的 。

span.span: Adds a to the for a particular URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您將加入只在一個特定主控件執行個體，請勿設定屬性執行個體。If you add a instance for just one specific host, do not set the property of the instance. 這會自動設定根據 URI。This is set automatically, based on the URI. 如果您的 URI 對應至本機網域，並傳送至本機網域上的所有主機，設定屬性等於".local"。If your URI corresponds to your local domain and sends to all the hosts on the local domain, set the property equal to ".local". 否則，請確定它會比對 URI 中使用的主機名稱。Otherwise, make sure it matches the host name used in the URI. 如果屬性是 Netscape、屬性，如果未設定明確地衍生自 URI，且從的 URI，包括頁面名稱的完整路徑。If the property of a is Netscape, the property of the , if not set explicitly, is derived from the URI and is the complete path from the URI, including the page name. 如果屬性等於屬性，一或多個加入之前從容器移除執行個體`cookie`參數。If the property equals the property, one or more instances are removed from the container before adding the `cookie` parameter. 夠執行個體將不會移除下方，如下所示： 如果在範圍內有過期的執行個體，它們會被清除。Enough instances are removed to bring below as follows: if there are expired instances in scope, they are cleaned up. 如果沒有，然後最近最少使用已找到並移除從容器。If not, then the least recently used is found and removed from the container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您將加入只在一個特定主控件執行個體，請勿設定屬性執行個體。If you add a instance for just one specific host, do not set the property of the instance. 這會自動設定根據 URI。This is set automatically, based on the URI. 如果您的 URI 對應至本機網域，並傳送至本機網域上的所有主機，設定屬性等於".local"。If your URI corresponds to your local domain and sends to all the hosts on the local domain, set the property equal to ".local". 否則，請確定它會比對 URI 中使用的主機名稱。Otherwise, make sure it matches the host name used in the URI. 如果等於、 一個或多個從容器移除執行個體之前加入`cookie`參數。If equals , one or more instances is removed from the container before adding the `cookie` parameter. 夠執行個體將不會移除下方，如下所示： 如果它們會被清除的範圍中有過期的執行個體。Enough instances are removed to bring below as follows: if there are expired instances in scope they are cleaned up. 如果沒有，然後最近最少使用已找到並移除從容器。If not, then the least recently used is found and removed from the container.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string GetCookieHeader(class System.Uri uri) cil managed

param.name: uri
param.span: 所需的 執行個體 URI。

span.span: The URI of the instances desired.

summary.span: 取得 HTTP Cookie 標頭，包含表示與特定 URI 關聯之 執行個體的 HTTP Cookie。

span.span: Gets the HTTP cookie header that contains the HTTP cookies that represent the instances that are associated with a specific URI.

returns.span: HTTP Cookie 標頭，其中含有表示 執行個體 (以分號分隔) 的字串。

span.span: An HTTP cookie header, with strings representing instances delimited by semicolons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回字串，包含的 HTTP cookie 標頭所指定的執行個體`uri`。 returns a string that holds the HTTP cookie header for the instances specified by `uri`. HTTP 標頭由所加入的字串表示，每個建置聯`uri`。The HTTP header is built by adding a string representation of each associated with `uri`. 請注意，字串的確切的格式取決於 RFC，符合。Note that the exact format of the string depends on the RFC that the conforms to. 所有的字串相關聯的執行個體`uri`會進行結合並以分號分隔。The strings for all the instances that are associated with `uri` are combined and delimited by semicolons. 這個字串不是做為第二個參數的正確格式方法。This string is not in the correct format for use as the second parameter of the method.

span.span: is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新執行個體建立。A new instance of a is created. 然後在讀取內部集合中指定的 URI 相關聯的執行個體，並且新增至新。Then the instances in the internal collection that are associated with the specified URI are read out and added to the new .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int PerDomainCapacity { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 在每一個網域可以保留的 執行個體數目。

value.span: 每一個網域允許的 執行個體數目。

span.span: The number of instances that are allowed per domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果新值小於目前的值，而且如果任何網域集合包含多個執行個體都大於新的值，以符合剪除集合。If the new value is less than the current value, and if any of the domain collections contain more instances than the new value, the collections are pruned to fit. 這會使用相同的基本規則中所述屬性。This uses the same basic rules as described in the property. 不過，這樣會清除只在這個網域的集合。However, this does the clean-up only on the collection for this domain.

span.span: The URI of the .

param.name: cookieHeader
param.span: 使用以逗號分隔的 執行個體，由 HTTP 伺服器傳回的 HTTP Set-Cookie 標頭的內容。

span.span: The contents of an HTTP set-cookie header as returned by a HTTP server, with instances delimited by commas.

summary.span: 將 HTTP Cookie 標頭中一或多個 Cookie 的 執行個體加入至特定 URI 的 。

span.span: Adds instances for one or more cookies from an HTTP cookie header to the for a specific URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會從 HTTP cookie 標頭的 HTTP cookie 中提取，建置每個，並將每個到內部相關聯的 uri。 pulls all the HTTP cookies out of the HTTP cookie header, builds a for each one, and then adds each to the internal that is associated with the URI. 中的 HTTP cookie`cookieHeader`必須以逗號分隔的字串。The HTTP cookies in the `cookieHeader` string must be delimited by commas.
